0.1.name: wordpress/nivo-slider-for-wordpress
0.1.description:
Atenção: O plugin está sendo descontinuado, mas pretendo em breve lançar outro plugin semelhante com melhor suporte com o WordPress 3.5 e um melhor código! Warning: The plugin is being discontinued, but I intend to soon launch similar gold plugin with better support with WordPress 3.5 and better code!

Nivo Slider for WordPress plugin is based on S3Slider developed by Vinicius Massuchetto, adapted for their use JQuery Nivo Slider.

  1. Upload and crop images, define captions and links;
  2. Set the size, order, timout of the slider, transition effect, slide transition speed, Pause time between the transitions, background color caption, text color caption, opacity background color caption;
  3. Enable or disable navigation arrows, use left & right on keyboard, Show only the navigation arrows when mouse is on the slide, Stop animation while the mouse is on
